name: Greenpoint Skatepark
description: Compact but well-designed park in the heart of Greenpoint. Strong local scene and good vibes.
history: Part of the Greenpoint waterfront redevelopment. Filled a gap in north Brooklyn's skate infrastructure.
bestTimes: Weekend mornings for a mellow session. Weekday evenings for the local crew.
transitDirections: G train to Greenpoint Ave, walk north.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, mini ramp, rails, hubba, flat bar. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Greenpoint. Part of the Greenpoint waterfront redevelopment. Filled a gap in north Brooklyn's skate infrastructure.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: G train to Greenpoint Ave, walk north.. Weekend mornings for a mellow session. Weekday evenings for the local crew.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
